body:
Hey I just want to say a quick thanks to all the staff and developers who have worked on the update. You people who are dissing it how it came out late and all the tiny little bugs should just stop! They Developers spend there own time to help us achieve to have fun and play on the server. They don't get payed to do this (i don't think). But seriously just because its in 1.8 and trust I'm not 1.8 fan it is still fun to stick with the community. Don't leave the server because of it. If u h8 me for writing this than h8 me.... :) u see that face. Thats my "i care so much face." One last thanks to the Devs because they do not get the credit they deserve.



Sincerely
-1v1Me_

title: Staff and Dev Thanks

replies.body: SO true. Guys, if you hate it, you still have to respect the people who created it. They worked hard for it. You can have your opinion whether it be negative or positive, just be respectful :^)
